resources.string:
Witch Fire 
 Caster's unit suffers a number of hits 
 equal to the Miscast Roll. The number 
 of hits cannot exceed the total number 
 of Wounds in the unit. These hits have 
 Strength MDU, Magical Attacks and 
 Armour Piercing (1).

Amnesia 
 Roll a D6: On 4+, the Wizard cannot
 cast the Miscast Spell this game
 anymore.

Catastrophic Detonation 
 Roll a D6: On 4+, the Wizard loses 
 a number of Wounds equal to half 
 its starting number of Wounds, 
 rounding fractions up (no saves 
 of any kind allowed). Miscast Spell 
 this game anymore.

Breach in the Veil 
 Roll a D6: On 4+, the Wizard is 
 dead, remove it from the game as a 
 casualty (no saves of any kind 
 allowed).
